title: Uniformity of application and construction
context: ARTICLE 9. MISCELLANEOUS PROVISIONS Note Article heading reenacted by L 2015, c 77, pt of ยง1. ยง576B-901 Uniformity of application and construction. In applying and construing this uniform act, consideration shall be given to the need to promote uniformity of the law with respect to its subject matter among states that enact it. [L 1997, c 295, pt of ยง1; am L 2015, c 77, pt of ยง1]
